title: How to Reach the Galactic Core in Spore

steps.headline: Make sure you have a nice empire in one of the galactic spirals before heading out to the center.
Make sure you have the best warp drive, energy and health before setting out.
There will be a lot of Grox surrounding the core, appease them to to avoid war.
Get omnipotent status so your fleet can have the maximum amount of allies.
Fill your fleet and buy at least 25 AoE repair packs and 20 of the best energy packs.
steps.description: Also the auto defense turret helps very much here.

steps.headline: Choose the densest Star path and head in.
Just pay attention to your health and don't worry about your enemies.
steps.description: Use your AoE repair pack only when someone is about to die.

steps.headline: Go as quickly as possible towards the center.

text: Make sure you have a nice empire in one of the galactic spirals before heading out to the center.  Make sure you have the best warp drive, energy and health before setting out.  There will be a lot of Grox surrounding the core, appease them to to avoid war.  Get omnipotent status so your fleet can have the maximum amount of allies.  Fill your fleet and buy at least 25 AoE repair packs and 20 of the best energy packs. Also the auto defense turret helps very much here. Choose the densest Star path and head in.  Just pay attention to your health and don't worry about your enemies. Use your AoE repair pack only when someone is about to die. Go as quickly as possible towards the center.
